```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(here)
```


```{r}
edu <- read.csv(here("data", "ncedu.csv"))
```


```{r}
edu <- edu %>%

edu = edu[1:101,]

edu <- edu %>%
```

